description: Imiti yo kwa muganga, imiti ite uburozi, iyica udukoko, amazi yabugenewe yo guhanagura imyanda, aside, amazi agenewe gufumbira ndetse n’ibikomoka kuri peteloli, kerozene na esanse bishobora kwica umwana cyangwa bikamutera ubumuga bwa burundu, bigomba kubikwa ahantu hizewe hatagera abana.
title: Imiti yo kwa muganga, imiti ite uburozi, iyica udukoko, amazi yabugenewe yo guhanagura imyanda, aside, amazi agenewe gufumbira ndetse n’ibikomoka kuri peteloli, kerozene na esanse bishobora kwica umwa
content:
Imiti yo kwa muganga, imiti ite uburozi, iyica udukoko, amazi yabugenewe yo guhanagura imyanda, aside, amazi agenewe gufumbira ndetse n’ibikomoka kuri peteloli, kerozene na esanse bishobora kwica umwana cyangwa bikamutera ubumuga bwa burundu, bigomba kubikwa ahantu hizewe hatagera abana. Ibintu bikozwe ku buryo byagira ingaruka ku buzima bw’abana, bigomba gushyirwa mu bikoresho byabugenewe, ntibigomba kubikwa mu macupa ajyamo amazi.

Uburozi bwinshi ntibugombera kuburya kugirango bugire ingaruka mbi. Bushobora kwica, gutera uburwayi bwo mu bwonko cyangwa ubuhumyi bwa burundu mu gihe:

 - Umwana abumize
 - buguye ku ruhu rw’umwana
 - bugiye mu maso y’umwana.
